histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallAppsToShow
histogram.summary: The number of available apps that are about to be shown in a UI for picking an app to start a phone call with. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallDevicesToShow
histogram.summary: The number of available devices that are about to be shown in a UI for picking a device to start a phone call on. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallDialerPresent
histogram.summary: Logged when we try to fire a dial intent in click to call. Distinguishes between if the user has an app that can handle dial intent or not. Android only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallDialogShown
histogram.summary: Logged whenever a dialog is shown for the Click to Call feature. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallPhoneNumberPrecompileTime
histogram.summary: Duration of the phone number regex precompilation task. This is recorded once after startup. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallSelectedAppIndex
histogram.summary: The index of the app selected by the user for Click to Call. Zero based. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.ClickToCallSelectedDeviceIndex
histogram.summary: The index of the device selected by the user for Click to Call. Zero based. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.DefaultSharesheetAndroid.Opened
histogram.summary: Records the origin of the share that opened the default sharesheet. Recorded when the sharesheeet is opened.

histogram.name: Sharing.DeviceInfoAvailable
histogram.summary: Whether a device identified by its guid is available in the local DeviceInfoTracker. Logged before sending a message to that guid.

histogram.name: Sharing.DeviceLastUpdatedAge
histogram.summary: The number of hours since the target device timestamp was last updated. Logged when a message is sent to the device. Not logged for sending ack messages. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.DeviceLastUpdatedAgeWithResult
histogram.summary: The number of hours since the target device timestamp was last updated. Logged when a message is sent to the device and the result is known. Not logged for sending ack messages. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.DeviceRegistrationResult
histogram.summary: Result of Sharing device registration. Logged after Sharing registration is attempted.

histogram.name: Sharing.DeviceUnregistrationResult
histogram.summary: Result of Sharing device un-registration. Logged after Sharing un-registration is attempted.

histogram.name: Sharing.MajorVersionComparison
histogram.summary: The comparison of the major version of Chrome on this (the sender) device and the receiver device. Logged when a message is sent. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.MessageAckTime
histogram.summary: The time from sending a FCM message from the Sharing service until an ack message is received for it.

histogram.name: Sharing.MessageHandlerTime
histogram.summary: The time from receiving a SharingMessage in SharingFCMHandler until an ack is sent back. Recorded when SendAckMessage callback is run in SharingMessageHandler.

histogram.name: Sharing.MessageReceivedType
histogram.summary: The type of SharingMessage (aka the PayloadCase). This is logged when a message is received through FCM by the handler in the Sharing service. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyDecodeImageTime
histogram.summary: The time to decode an image for Remote Copy. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyHandleMessageResult
histogram.summary: The result of handling a Remote Copy message. Logged once per message, when the handler for the Remote Copy FCM message is finished handling it. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyLoadImageStatusCode
histogram.summary: Result code from loading an image for Remote Copy. Logs net::Error if it's not net::OK. Logs net::OK if response header is not present. Otherwise, logs HTTP status code. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyLoadImageTime
histogram.summary: The time to load an image for Remote Copy. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyReceivedImageSizeAfterDecode
histogram.summary: The size of the image loaded from the image URL specified in a Remote Copy message received from FCM, after decoding. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyReceivedImageSizeBeforeDecode
histogram.summary: The size of the image loaded from the image URL specified in a Remote Copy message received from FCM, before decoding. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyReceivedTextSize
histogram.summary: The size of the text in a Remote Copy message received from FCM. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyResizeImageTime
histogram.summary: The time to resize an image for Remote Copy. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyWriteImageDetectionTime
histogram.summary: The time to detect a clipboard image write for Remote Copy. Logged after writing the image. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyWriteImageTime
histogram.summary: The time to write an image to the clipboard for Remote Copy. Logged after writing the image. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyWriteTextDetectionTime
histogram.summary: The time to detect a clipboard text write for Remote Copy. Logged after writing the text. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.RemoteCopyWriteTextTime
histogram.summary: The time to write text to the clipboard for Remote Copy. Logged after writing the text. Desktop only.

histogram.name: Sharing.Screenshot.Action
histogram.summary: Logged when actions are taken in the sharing screenshot image editing feature.

histogram.name: Sharing.ScreenshotsAndroid.IsEditorDismissedOnStart
histogram.summary: Whether the editor was dismissed during editor recreation.

histogram.name: Sharing.SendAckMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of sending an ack for a SharingMessage by the Sharing service. Logged in the callback for sending the message to FCM. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.SendMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of sending a SharingMessage by the Sharing service. Logged after the send message callback is run. Not logged for sending ack messages. All platforms.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharedClipboardDevicesToShow
histogram.summary: The number of available devices that are about to be shown in a UI for picking a device to share the clipboard with. On desktop, it gets recorded when the user right clicks on selected text. On Android, it gest recorded when the user does long press, share and "Send text to Your Devices".

histogram.name: Sharing.SharedClipboardDialogShown
histogram.summary: Logged whenever a dialog is shown for the Shared Clipboard feature.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharedClipboardRetries
histogram.summary: The retry count for sending a shared clipboard message. The zero value is for the first attempt to send the message, which is not a retry. Logged when the result of sending the message is known.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharedClipboardSelectedDeviceIndex
histogram.summary: The index of the device selected by the user for Shared Clipboard gets recorded when the user chooses the destination device for sharing text. Zero based.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharedClipboardSelectedTextSize
histogram.summary: The size of the selected text in Shared Clipboard gets recorded when the user shares selected text.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharingHubAndroid.Opened
histogram.summary: Records the origin of the share that opened the sharing hub. Recorded when the sharing hub is opened.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharingHubAndroid.ThirdPartyAppUsage
histogram.summary: Records the index of the third party app selected from the bottom row of the sharing hub.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharingHubAndroid.TimeToShare
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time taken for the user to select a share target after initiating a share.

histogram.name: Sharing.SharingHubAndroid.TimeToShowShareSheet
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time taken for the custom share sheet to open after a share was initiated.

histogram.name: Sharing.WebRtc.IceConfigFetched
histogram.summary: Number of ice servers fetched by network traversal API call. Logged after receiving response of API call.
